channel.title: Webclient Help Pl0x
channel.description:
Hi, i need help with my webclient ive done everything and uploaded cache.zip and putted direct link.. and made cache.zip to an .jar file and when im starting my webclient it says: Error click here for more details and it shows some errors..
The errors are:
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.io.IOException: open HTTP connection failed:http://localhost/webclient/client/class.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.getBytes(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) ... 7 more Undantag: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class inläsning: klassen client.class finns inte. java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.io.IOException: open HTTP connection failed:http://localhost/webclient/client/class.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.getBytes(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) ... 7 more Undantag: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class
Please help me ill give you an reward :D

item.title: Webclient Help Pl0x
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

Don’t make your cache.zip into a jar file. What you do is download JAR maker and make your client into a jar file then upload that.

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient Help Pl0x
item.dc:creator: @sjpk sjpk
item.description:
@sjpk wrote:

did you upload you client.class to your website?

Read full topic
